member.name: T:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller
member.summary: A controller used to control the flow of loads through a system.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.#ctor(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Constructs a for the given .
member.param: The to construct a for.

member.name: P:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.LoggingEnabled
member.summary: Whether logging is enabled for this controller. If true, messages will be logged for debugging purposes. If false, no messages will be logged.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.ConveyToOn(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,System.Object,Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary:
FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY
Conveys the given load to the given target, then the given station. The load is automatically routed through the system to reach each target, if the necessary connections exist. An exception is thrown if any target cannot be reached.
member.param: The load to convey.
The final destination of the load.
The intermediate target for the load.
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the load arrives at the final target.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.ConveyTo(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Conveys the given load to the given target. The load is automatically routed through the system to reach the target, if the necessary connections exist. An exception is thrown if the target cannot be reached.
member.param: The load to convey.
The target for the load.
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the load arrives at the target.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.CancelConveyTo(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Cancels the current ConveyTo command for the load, if one exists.
member.param: The load to cancel the current ConveyTo command for.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.NamedOrderList(System.String,Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the order list with the given name, on the given . If is true, an order list with the given name will be created and added to the if not found.
member.param: The name of the order list to find/create.
The to find/create the order list on.
Should the order list be created if not found.
member.returns: The order list channel.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.Enstation(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Removes the load from its current station, and adds it to the target station. The load is then held at the target station.
member.param: The load to enstation.
The target station to add the load to.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.Unstation(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Removes the load from its current station.
member.param: The load to unstation.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.AddLoadToOrderList(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds the load to the given order list. The order list may be a visual channel or a . If a is specified, the default order list on the is used.
member.param: The load to add to the order list.
May be a visual channel or a .
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the load is added to the order list.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.WaitToBeOrderedOn(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds the load to the given order list, and waits for the load to be ordered. The order list may be a visual channel or a . If a is specified, the default order list on the is used.
member.param: The load to add to the order list and wait for the order of.
May be a visual channel or a .
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the load is ordered from the order list.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.WaitToBeOrdered(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Waits for the load to be added to an order list if it does not belong to one already, then waits for the load to be ordered from its order list.
member.param: The load to wait to be ordered from an order list.
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the load is ordered from an order list.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.WaitForLoadToArrive(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Waits for the load to arrive at its .
member.param: The load to wait to arrive at its .
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the load arrives at its .

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.OrderListIsEmpty(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns true if the order list is empty, false otherwise. The order list may be a visual channel or a . If a is specified, the default order list on the is used.
member.param: The order list to check for items. May be a visual channel or a .
member.returns: True if the order list is empty, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.PeekAtOrderList(System.Object)
member.summary:
Peeks at the given order list.
Returns a immediately, without blocking. The may be awaited, and the value will be set when a load is present in the order list and the peek is complete.
The order list may be a visual channel or a . If a is specified, the default order list on the is used.
member.param: The order list to peek at. May be a visual channel or a .
member.returns: A result where the value will be set when a load is present on the order list, and the peek is complete.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.PeekAtOrderList(System.String,Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary:
Peeks at the order list of the given name on the given .
Returns a immediately, without blocking. The may be awaited, and the value will be set when a load is present in the order list and the peek is complete.
member.param: The name of the order list.
The to find/create the named order list on.
member.returns: A result where the value will be set when a load is present on the order list, and the peek is complete.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.HoldLoad(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Holds the load at its current station. See .
member.param: The load to hold at its current station.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.ReleaseLoad(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Releases the load from its current station. See .
member.param: The load to release from its current station.

member.summary: Orders the children of the given with physics body type by their position along the y-axis (top to bottom).
member.param: The to return the stack items of.
member.returns: The eligible children of ordered by their position along the Y-axis.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.Depalletize(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,System.Int32)
member.summary: Transfers the given number of eligible children from the top of to . Visuals with physics body type are eligible, and ordered by their position along the y-axis (top to bottom).
member.param: The to transfer children from.
The to transfer the children of to.
The number of children to transfer.
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the given number of children have been transferred from to .

member.summary: Transfers the elements of to in the order given.
member.param: The Visuals to transfer to .
The to transfer the elements of to.
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the elements of have been transferred to .

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.WaitUntilOrderListCount(System.Object,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Waits until the given order list has the given number of items.
The order list may be a visual channel or a . If a is specified, the default order list on the is used.
member.param: May be a visual channel or a
The number of items.
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the given order list has the given number of items.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.TeleportTo(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Transfers the load from its current station to the target station, adjusting the matrix of the load accordingly.
member.param: The load to teleport.
The target to teleport the load to.
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the load has been transferred to the given target.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.TransferFromNowhereTo(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)

member.param: The load to transfer.
The target to transfer the load to.
member.returns: An that completes when the load has been transferred to the given target.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.DeleteLoad(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Deletes the given load, removing it from its current station.
member.param: The load to delete, and remove from its current station.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.OrderFrom(System.Object)
member.summary:
Orders a load from the and returns a immediately, without blocking. The may be awaited, and the value will be set when the order is complete.
The may be a with an aspect, a , a visual channel, or a (default order list will be used).
member.param: The source to order the load from. May be a with an aspect, a , a visual channel, or a (default order list will be used).
member.returns: A result where the value will be set when the order is complete.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.PushLoadOnto(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,Demo3D.Visuals.Visual,Demo3D.Visuals.SpeedProfile)
member.summary: Disables physics for the load and animates it onto the target, then re-enables physics for the load. If the target is a , first waits until the motor is on.
member.param: The load to animate.
The target to animate the load onto.
The to animate the load with.
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the load has been animated onto the target.

The to transfer the load from.
The to transfer the load to.
member.returns: An that completes enumeration when the load has been transferred from to .

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.Controller.IsBlocked(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Returns whether or not the target is blocked. If the target is TransferStateEnabled, will be evaluated. Else if the target is a sensor, its status will be evaluated. Else if any of the target's children are sensors, their status will be evaluated.
member.returns: Whether the target is blocked.

member.name: T:Demo3D.FlowControl.IStation
member.summary: A station is a location where loads may be conveyed to, held at, and released from.

member.name: P:Demo3D.FlowControl.IStation.RoutingVisual
member.summary: The to be used when finding a route to this station. For example, control points on a track will have this set to the track controller, since that's the connected between conveyors, itself managing the routing between control points.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.IStation.ReleaseLoad(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Release the load held at this station. Allow the load to continue on its route.
member.param: The load to release.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.IStation.HoldLoad(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Hold the load at this station. Prevent it from continuing on its route.
member.param: The load to hold.

member.summary: Block until the specified load arrives at this station.
member.param: The load to wait for the arrival of.
member.returns: An that returns a value when the load arrives.

member.name: M:Demo3D.FlowControl.IStation.RemoveLoad(Demo3D.Visuals.Visual)
member.summary: Remove the load from this station. The load is not altered physically (moved or deleted).
member.param: The load to remove.

member.summary: Add the load to this station. The load is not moved.
